meanings.definition: Each of the parts of the calyx of a flower, enclosing the petals and typically green and leaflike.
meanings.sent1: The sepals protect the delicate petals of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The green sepals of the rose bud slowly unfurled.
meanings.sent3: The sepals whispered secrets to the petals.
meanings.sent4: The sepals stood guard around the flower like vigilant soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The sepals shielded the petals from the harsh sun, like a canopy of leaves.
